My friend (feel free to make yourself known in the comments) doodled this little lad and wished to make it a custom sight, and so I did.

This is kind of a break from the usual "high effort" gooner sights as I have a lot going on and therefore wanted to take on a smaller task and this was just the thing.

Thank you all for your continued support and feel free to request a sight from me if you wish to. (unlikely to be made right at this instant as I am likely busy)

#sight #peak #thiswillimproveyouraim #holypeakIlovethis #iamactivelygooningasiwritethis #droopysight #wtlive #wtdraw #silly ...
